item.title: The Enhanced Games Has a Date, a Host City, and a Drug-Fueled World Record
item.description: The Enhanced Games, where athletes are allowed to take performance-enhancing drugs, will host its first event in May. One “enhanced” former Olympic sw...

item.title: FEMA Has Canceled Its 4-Year Strategic Plan Ahead of Hurricane Season
item.description: Multiple FEMA employees tell WIRED that they did not know of another time when a strategic plan was rescinded without another in place.

item.title: OpenAI's Big Bet That Jony Ive Can Make AI Hardware Work
item.description: Io, a firm Ive and Sam Altman cocreated, will now merge with OpenAI.

item.title: Google’s Android Chief Hopes Its ‘New Era’ Will Get People to Ditch Their iPhones
item.description: Android is getting a design refresh, launching a mixed reality platform for smart glasses, and Gemini is expanding to cars and watches. Can it entice ...

item.title: A Gaming YouTuber Says an AI-Generated Clone of His Voice Is Being Used to Narrate 'Doom' Videos
item.description: Mark Brown, who posts game explainers to his Game Maker’s Toolkit channel, says his persona has been plagiarized.
